main event: Two young males and one civilian observed an orange fire-colored, cigar-shaped object in Castorville, Texas on October 9, 1959.
interesting points: The object was the size of a streetlight and moved both vertically and horizontally., The observation lasted for 20 minutes., Observers used 7x35 binoculars during the sighting., The weather was clear at the time of the sighting., Local AFB towers reported negative results when contacted.
witness description: two young males and one civilian, considered reliable
